body.name: TWINNIS 6x9 Large Shag Area Rugs for Living Room Bedroom, Tie-Dye Light Grey Indoor Super Soft Fuzzy Plush Rugs, Upgrade Anti-Skid Modern Rugs Fluffy Carpets for Kids Room Nursery Home Decor
features: Premium Material：Create a comfortable home area. Our shag area rug is made of durable synthetic microfiber, it's very comfy when you touch the soft bedroom rugs. There are 5 practical sizes of the shaggy soft rug you can choose from. The design concept of our Tie-Dye floor carpet is derived from elements that meet the needs of modern trends

Comfortable Experience: Walk on a soft fluffy carpet and have a good mood - Our faux fur rug is super soft if you go barefoot, you'll feel like you're walking on clouds, a fuzzy and warm fur carpet is a great choice for family party on the floor, we are committed to bringing comfort to your daily life which you really want

Versatile and Colorful: Leading home furnishing fashion - The shag rugs are suitable for many indoor occasions, it can be a living room rug, bedroom rug, children's room rug, playroom rug and nursery rug. Our soft fluffy shag area rug is a nice gift for interior decor and creates a comfy atmosphere for your home

Easy to Clean: Spot clean recommended - If there are little stains, wipe them with a damp cloth instead of machine washing. You can use a vacuum cleaner on the lowest setting for daily square rug care. Our large living room rugs can be washed by hand or by machine

Non-slip Bottom: Spread love under your feet - Our home decor rug uses non-woven fabric and point plastic anti-slip base so that you can use the large rug more safely. We continue to research and further develop the anti-slip properties of fuzzy carpets, the non-slip rug will be your first choice and guard your every step
body.description: High quality carpets bring a different visual atmosphere to your home.Some features and tips about our fluffy shag carpet:1.The top layer is a fluffy material and the inter layer is memory sponge. The shaggyrug for living room is beyond soft and comfy.2.Have a non slip surface on the rug's back. Let your children and pets can safely play on the floor bedside rug.3.There are many colors and sizes of the decorative accent fluffy carpets for you to choose from.4.Quality is true soft nice material, make your home have a luxurious feeling.5.Adopt sponge hemlock technology, durable lasting.Size selection suggestions:The 4’×6’ area rug and the 5’×8’ area rug are suitable for your playroom or bedroom.The 6’×9’ area rug and the 8’×10’ area rug are suitable for your large living room or big dining room.Color selection suggestions:The color of grey rug/black rug/coffee rug/blue gray rug is suitable for calm home decor.The color of purple rug/light tan rug is suitable for relaxing home decor, especially the girls' room.The color of blue rug/indigo rug/green rug is suitable for cheerful home decor, especially the boys' room.Shopping instructions:1. Our area rug is compressed in a vacuum bag, it will fluffed back up in a couple of days, please do not worry about this situation.2. Please wash the carpets according to the instructions of the washing. Do not insolate after washing.3. If you find some smell of the product when receiving it, it's a normal phenomenon caused by warehouse storage, just please expose it to the air for some time.4. Due to the different lighting effects of the monitor and camera, the image may be slightly different from the actual color of the product.5. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My rottweiler loves it
reviews.reviewText: It is far too small for my bedroom but I knew it would be. I bought the 4x6 to see if I would even like it, and I do. it is very soft and very pretty. my bedroom is as large as a living room(No I am not kidding) I would need a 20 x 20 carpet to do my room. But for being far to small, as long as my dog likes it, that is what counts, and yes I will buy more. I love it and there is no smell that others are talking about. I bet what they were talking about is the smell from the plastic it is packed in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful rug and soft. Just as pictured

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: Looks perfect!!Make sure you get the exact size you need!! Don’t buy a few inches bigger because they are huge!!Only thing that makes me put 4 stars is how much it sheds. You don’t notice it but when you sit on the carpet with black yoga pants it’ll look like you were holding a dog.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is worth the price
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I, love it. But bad for the buck at all. You're not going to get a cushion-like feeling, because let's be honest, you're not paying for that. For what you're paying for. It's worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars For looks only.
reviews.reviewText: This rug is very thin, not plush, and does not vacuum well. It is cute looking but if you want a comfy carpet to sot, lay, or play on this is not it. Would be perfect for a non traffic room that you want to look nice but not use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as thick deep plush as it looks in the picture
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this rug to go into the room where I foster kitties. It looked like a very plush and deep pile in the picture. I thought it would be great to be able to sit on the floor to play with the kitties on the plush rug. I'm actually a little disappointed because it's really not that thick deep plush as it appears in the picture. It is decent enough though and it will do for the purpose I intended to use it for. It was inexpensive so I guess the value is fair enough for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck!
reviews.reviewText: Supper soft and great foot support. Love love love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
